ca.ualberta.cmput301f20t04.bookatmenow

Class RequestList

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.widget.BaseAdapter
      • ca.ualberta.cmput301f20t04.bookatmenow.BookList
        • ca.ualberta.cmput301f20t04.bookatmenow.RequestList
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.widget.Adapter, android.widget.ListAdapter, android.widget.SpinnerAdapter
    Deprecated.

    public class RequestList
extends BookList
    A BaseAdapter class specialized for a database of Books that are currently being requested from a given owner. With this adapter, the owner will be able to accept or reject requests.

    • Method Detail

      • getView

        @NonNull
public android.view.View getView(int position,
                                           android.view.View convertView,
                                           android.view.ViewGroup parent)
        Deprecated. 
        A required method from BaseAdapter for displaying an element of the internal list at a given position.
        Parameters:
        position - The position of the element to display from the internal list
        convertView - The external View in which to display the element's data
        parent - The ViewGroup containing the elements of the ListView
        Returns:
        The original given View, converted into a row of the internal list

      • getItemId

        public long getItemId(int position)
        Deprecated. 
        A required method from BaseAdapter for getting a unique identifying long value from an element of the internal list at a given position. In this case, because the same book can be in this list multiple times, and the order of the filteredList is never changed, the book's position itself is its unique identifier.
        Parameters:
        position - The position in the internal filtered list from which to get a unique feature of the element
        Returns:
        The book's position
